original_title: Protest against holocaust of Palestinian nationals in Gaza
original_body_lines: The Kithusara Movement this week held a protest against alleged Holocaust of Palestinian nationals in Gaza in front of UN Headquarters in Colombo. The priests and nuns who participated in the protest also held a candle light procession toward the Palestine Embassy in Colombo. They said the world will not have peace without peace and normalcy in Palestine, which is the homeland of Jesus born upon this day – Pic by Pradeep Pathirana
